title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. It should be starting the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
OB: When I launch the Help view and press the tab key, nothing happens.
EB: When I launch the Help view, pressing the tab key should allow me to navigate through the elements.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key. No response should be observed.
